record.title:
09:00

We will be arriving in Genoa at 9am, you will be provided with your disembarkation information the evening before.

We will awake to cruising our way to Barcelona where we will arrive at 1pm. This will be the first day of conference.

08:00 – 16:00

The registration desk will be open at the Atrium

08:30 – 10:30

Plenary Conference Sessions will take place in the Teatro L’avanguardia on Deck 6/7.

08:00 – 16:00

The registration desk will be open at the Atrium on Deck 9.

08:30 – 10:30

Leisure Breakout: (Eyes) Open to the Possibilities in the Teatro L’avanguardia on Deck 6/7.

Corporate Breakout: TMC 20/20 Vision – Progress and Potential in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

13:00 – 15:00

We will be embarking MSC Fantasia from 1pm. You will be required to check-in by 3pm and we will be setting sail at 5pm so please make sure you are aboard in good time. Please note you will be required to take part in a muster drill before we set sail and your on-board identity card will be scanned on your attendance at the drill so please attend.

13:00 – 16:30

The registration desk will be open at the Atrium

08:00

We will arrive in Palma, breakfast will be available in the Zanzibar buffet restaurant on Deck 14 between 7-9am.

08:00 – 16:00

The registration desk will be open at the Atrium

09:00 – 13:00

Speed-dating will take place on board ship.

17:30 – 19:00

We will be hosting our ‘Sail Away’ drinks reception on deck 15 in the Zen Bar at 5pm which will provide us with fantastic views of Genoa as we sail away. This will be followed by a buffet dinner and drinks from 7pm in L’Africana on Deck 14. The dress code for this evening is casual. Please note all evening dress codes are applicable for all ship guests for these ship wide events, these dress codes are not exclusive to Advantage.

10:30 – 11:00

Coffee Break for all delegates in Transatlantico on Deck 7.

11:00 – 13:30

Plenary session – keynote speaker Chris Hadfield in the Teatro L’avanguardia on Deck 6/7.

10:30 – 11:00

Coffee Break for Leisure sessions will be in Il Transatlantico on Deck 7 and for Corporate sessions in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

11:00 – 13:00

Leisure Breakout: (Eyes) Open to the Possibilities in the Teatro L’avanguardia on Deck 6/7.

Corporate Breakout: TMC 20/20 Vision – Progress and Potential in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

13:00 onwards

We set sail from Palma at 5pm so you will have some time to look around Palma at your leisure or join a shore excursion before we leave. Alternatively you can return to the ship to fully explore it and experience the Aurea Spa, the 4D cinema and the F1 simulator.

13:30 onwards

Lunch at leisure. You will have the opportunity to visit Ajaccio, we are planning an official excursion here.

17:00 – 18:30

Pre-dinner drinks reception in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

17:00 – 18:30

Captain’s Cocktail Reception in the Atrium on deck 9.

13:00 onwards

Lunch at leisure/ Free time

17:00 – 18:30

Pre-dinner drinks reception in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

18:30 – 20:00

Dinner is served – the dress code for this evening is 70’s (your chance to dress up if you wish).

Please note all evening dress codes are applicable for all ship guests for these ship wide events, these dress codes are not exclusive to the Advantage Conference.

20:00 onwards

After dinner bar in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

18:30 – 20:00

Gala dinner – the dress code for this evening is Black Tie (tuxedo, dinner jacket or dark suit and tie for gentlemen and formal gown or cocktail dress for ladies).

Please note all evening dress codes are applicable for all ship guests for these ship wide events, these dress codes are not exclusive to the Advantage Conference.

20:00 onwards

After dinner drinks at leisure.

18:30 – 20:00

Dinner – the dress code for this evening is Italian (smart casual). MSC have said that staff generally wear red, green and white but very few customers stick to the theme and it definitely isn’t fancy dress.

Please note all evening dress codes are applicable for all ship guests for these ship wide events, these dress codes are not exclusive to the Advantage Conference.

20:00 onwards

After dinner drinks
